default_template_types.title: Index
default_template_types.description: Used as a fallback template for all pages when a more specific template is not defined.

default_template_types.title: Blog Home
default_template_types.description: Displays the latest posts as either the site homepage or as the "Posts page" as defined under reading settings. If it exists, the Front Page template overrides this template when posts are shown on the homepage.

default_template_types.title: Front Page
default_template_types.description: Displays your site's homepage, whether it is set to display latest posts or a static page. The Front Page template takes precedence over all templates.

default_template_types.title: Single Entries
default_template_types.description: Displays any single entry, such as a post or a page. This template will serve as a fallback when a more specific template (e.g. Single Post, Page, or Attachment) cannot be found.

default_template_types.title: Single Posts
default_template_types.description: Displays a single post on your website unless a custom template has been applied to that post or a dedicated template exists.

default_template_types.title: Pages
default_template_types.description: Displays a static page unless a custom template has been applied to that page or a dedicated template exists.

default_template_types.title: All Archives
default_template_types.description: Displays any archive, including posts by a single author, category, tag, taxonomy, custom post type, and date. This template will serve as a fallback when more specific templates (e.g. Category or Tag) cannot be found.

default_template_types.title: Author Archives
default_template_types.description: Displays a single author's post archive. This template will serve as a fallback when a more specific template (e.g. Author: Admin) cannot be found.

default_template_types.title: Category Archives
default_template_types.description: Displays a post category archive. This template will serve as a fallback when a more specific template (e.g. Category: Recipes) cannot be found.

default_template_types.title: Taxonomy
default_template_types.description: Displays a custom taxonomy archive. Like categories and tags, taxonomies have terms which you use to classify things. For example: a taxonomy named "Art" can have multiple terms, such as "Modern" and "18th Century." This template will serve as a fallback when a more specific template (e.g. Taxonomy: Art) cannot be found.

default_template_types.title: Date Archives
default_template_types.description: Displays a post archive when a specific date is visited (e.g., example.com/2023/).

default_template_types.title: Tag Archives
default_template_types.description: Displays a post tag archive. This template will serve as a fallback when a more specific template (e.g. Tag: Pizza) cannot be found.

default_template_types.title: Attachment Pages
default_template_types.description: Displays when a visitor views the dedicated page that exists for any media attachment.

default_template_types.title: Search Results
default_template_types.description: Displays when a visitor performs a search on your website.

default_template_types.title: Privacy Policy
default_template_types.description: Displays your site's Privacy Policy page.

default_template_types.title: Page: 404
default_template_types.description: Displays when a visitor views a non-existent page, such as a dead link or a mistyped URL.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Standard
default_template_types.description: Displays the Standard post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Aside
default_template_types.description: Displays the Aside post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Chat
default_template_types.description: Displays the Chat post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Gallery
default_template_types.description: Displays the Gallery post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Link
default_template_types.description: Displays the Link post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Image
default_template_types.description: Displays the Image post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Quote
default_template_types.description: Displays the Quote post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Status
default_template_types.description: Displays the Status post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Video
default_template_types.description: Displays the Video post format archive.

default_template_types.title: Post Format: Audio
default_template_types.description: Displays the Audio post format archive.

default_template_part_areas.label: General
default_template_part_areas.description: General templates often perform a specific role like displaying post content, and are not tied to any particular area.

default_template_part_areas.label: Header
default_template_part_areas.description: The Header template defines a page area that typically contains a title, logo, and main navigation.

default_template_part_areas.label: Footer
default_template_part_areas.description: The Footer template defines a page area that typically contains site credits, social links, or any other combination of blocks.
